channel.title: [317] RevoltScape
channel.description: Hello Everyone RevoltScape is about a a week old server with about 25 players at this time (epicurus source) -currently looking for staff ^server features^ -two diferent worlds -a eco world -an easy pk world -many bosses and fun features youll have to come check out :) *if you wish to play you can visit www.revoltscape.wix.com/revolt or revoltscape.createaforum.com hope to see many of you there :)

item.title: [317] RevoltScape
item.dc:creator: @im_cudi im_cudi
item.description:
@im_cudi wrote:

Hello Everyone
RevoltScape is about a a week old server with about 25 players at this time
(epicurus source)
-currently looking for staff
^server features^
-two diferent worlds
-a eco world
-an easy pk world
-many bosses and fun features youll have to come check out
*if you wish to play you can visit www.revoltscape.wix.com/revolt or revoltscape.createaforum.com
hope to see many of you there
